origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.get_loan_options', 'description': 'This function provides loan options for specific projects based on the type of project, cost budget, and expected value increase.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'projectType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of project, e.g., auto_modification, home_renovation.'}, {'name': 'costBudget', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The total cost budget for the project.'}, {'name': 'expectedValueIncrease', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The expected increase in value post-project.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'loanOptions', 'description': 'The available loan options and their terms.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceAPI.get_loan_options, 它的参数输入如下: 'projectType'是'auto_modification', 'costBudget'是'10000', 'expectedValueIncrease'是'5000'.
